title: Which jungler has the highest damage potential?

replies.body:
I mean, the highest damage potential is basically based on how fed you get from ganks, and that applies to like all the junglers.

Though right now Farm junglers are more meta (due to catchup EXP not being there anymore.)

Farm Junglers aren't meta since camps still take too long to respawn for a pure/heavy farming style to be viable.

However balanced and varied styles of play are now viable and encouragable in the current setting, thanks to EXP and Gold rates of camps no longer pushed down to support levels. (and you're not forced to play junglers that can do the S7 level 4 clear or are Graves/Ivern)

I mean... it's Farm junglers.

Shyvana being a prime example of this.

It just requires good use of counter jungling and knowing when you can gank for the free kills.

It depends on your play style and what you want to accomplish.

As a Jungler you have a lot more pressure on you than any other role.
You need to look at your team composition and supplement it to the best of your abilities.

Is your team too AP heavy with an AP tank top and a mage mid?
Then look to an AD Assassin.

Are top and support lacking significant Hard CC?
Look to a lock down champion. (likely a tank)

------------------------------------

Damage isn't what you should be asking, not for any role.
Every champion in the game can output high damage given the right user and/or build.

What is your TEAM playing what is the ENEMY team playing?
How does your champion pick fit into this puzzle?

Can you pick Rengar into a two tank + Lulu/Janna team comp?
Not likely unless if you can end it pre-20 minutes.

depends on what type of 'most damage' jungler you're looking for.

most single target melee burst damage would probably be Xin Zhao
most earlygame snowball magic damage would probably be Elise
most AoE magic damage would probably go to Fiddlesticks
most overall melee dps damage would probably be Udyr
most lategame dps would probably be Master Yi.
most earlygame physical damage would probably be Pantheon
most lategame magic damage would probably be Ekko.

In general though you're probably looking at Xin Zhao as your highest damage jungler option.

also worth mentioning that ap udyr, glass cannon hecarim and lethality wukong can have devastating damage if you they can get past the fact that these builds are terrible before you start getting some items.

Full AP Amumu has a lot of AoE magic damage with his ult. 

Also, a full build (or fed) Evelynn can one-shot tanks, and can kill squishies with just a single Empowered E.

Most dmg isn't what you're looking for in a jungler. You can build dmg on any jungler, but normally they are there for CC/ganks.

Don't get me wrong, you can carry from jungle, it's just not optimal for the team (better to have mid or ADC  fed).
